name: bloodshot (rogueNoodle)
description:
Play free on GameJolt (with leaderboard!) -> bloodshot on Gamejolt

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 32 - Unconventional Weapons

Ludum Dare Page

----------------------------------------------------------------

There's something about your blood - the reaction they have to it... it just might be enough to hold them off. This is a rescue mission first, but if you happen to take down one or 100 of these alien freaks in the meantime? Even better...

----------------------------------------------------------------

WASD to move (can be customized on the main menu)

Mouse to aim and shoot. Your blood is your ammo though, so guns blazing might not be the best tactic.

Follow the guiding arrow at your feet to find the next injured civilian and reach them before they die. Stand next to them to donate the blood they need to survive, but make sure you leave enough for yourself.

Red cell count a little low? You can always get more from the chunks of dead alien. If you're into that sort of thing.
